mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rank, tbl.* FROM( SELECT title, REPLACE(open_dt, '-', '.') AS open_dt FROM box_office WHERE SUBSTR(open_dt, 1, 4) >= #{yearFrom} AND SUBSTR(open_dt, 1, 4) < #{yearFrom} + 10 ORDER BY viewer DESC )tbl ) WHERE rank>0 AND rank<=20
mapper.update: MERGE INTO movie USING DUAL ON (movie_id = #{movieId}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (movie_id, title, open_dt, poster) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{title}, #{openDt}, #{poster})
